Furthermore, the Hodge filtration induces the stupid filtration (), and so the spectral sequence in is given by translations of the degrees of the classical spectral sequence E_1^{pq} = \operatorname {H}^q(\widetilde {Y}^n,\Omega _{\widetilde {Y}^n}^p(\varepsilon ^n)) \Rightarrow \operatorname {H}^{p+q}(\widetilde {Y}^n,\varepsilon ^n).
